name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Horsy.ai: Chat & Summarize YouTube videos (Free Summaries)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gallop through YouTube with Horsy.ai – your smart companion for quick, intelligent video summaries! The fastest YouTube summarizer!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gallop through YouTube content with Horsy.ai - your intelligent companion for faster, smarter video consumption! It is the fastest youtube summarizer in the market

##  Key Features:
• 🚀 Get FREE instant AI-powered video summaries with timestamped quotes
• 📝 Get FREE transcripts to copy
• 💬 Chat with videos and ask questions while watching for efficient learning
• 📊 Analyze entire YouTube channels at once
• 🌍 Multi-language support for global accessibility
• ✂️ Customize summary length - from quick TLDR to detailed reports

## Perfect for:
✓ Busy professionals staying informed without time waste
✓ Students mastering course content and exam prep
✓ Content creators researching trending topics
✓ Educators enriching teaching materials
✓ Journalists extracting accurate quotes
✓ Anyone wanting to learn more in less time

## How it works:
1. Install the extension
2. Open any YouTube video
3. Click the summary icon next to Horsy.ai icon
4. Get FREE instant summaries and start chatting!
